chinese: 于以采蘋、南㵎之濱。于以采藻、于彼行潦。
english: She gathers the large duckweed,By the banks of the stream in the southern valley.She gathers the pondweed,In those pools left by the floods.

chinese: 于以盛之、維筐及筥。于以湘之、維錡及釜。
english: She deposits what she gathers,In her square baskets and round onesShe boils it,In her tripods and pans.

chinese: 于以奠之、宗室牖下。誰其尸之、有齊季女。
english: She sets forth her preparations,Under the window in the ancestral chamber.Who superintends the business?It is [this] reverent young lady.
